column5: I went on a 3 day canoe camping trip a week ago in the Parry Sound area with my friend Keith.  We base camped at one site.  Friday was sunny but cool.  It went down to -2 Friday night but it warmed up Saturday and the fishing improved. We got 10 fish on Saturday.  The cool temps kept the bugs away and we had the lake to ourselves.  It was a good first trip of the year. ourselves.      The pike and salmon seem to like this Blue Fox Spoon.   Keith with brunch   Firewood Run   Cajun Pike and a side of pig.
Awesome. That's doing it up right.
Great report. Sure wish my gsp was that calm in a canoe!
Cool report.  I'm dying to get back out camping now.
Great way to start the season Tim.
Beauty trip,  I haven't been on a canoe trip in a while.   The wife's arms get sore after the first day
nice report. love having a spot with no one else around. peace and quiet and just an awesome way to recharge the batteries

Great report I am fortunate enough to live in the Parry Sound district so many lakes to choose with great fishing sure looks like you guys picked a great spot to set up camp thanks for sharing.  Cheers
Nice report and great pics...wow does that ever make me want to load up the canoe with gear and hit the water!!!!! Looks like a fun trip, they always are. Your puppy must have had a blast as well.

That's the stuff I live for! Just me my brothers and my son........... Oh how I long for it!   Thanks for sharing!   I seriously can't wait to give a similar report. I really don't care if I catch any fish. Just camping on crown land on a picturesque Canadian Shield lake. Gadzooks! Where did all my vacation time go!!!  Signed, Jealous
Nice Tim!  Great looking camp and trip to set off the season.
Great report, looks like a cool place.
